product_data: ProductLocaleCode esMX ProductName Burning Crusade StartMenuFolderName World of Warcraft LogFileName Logs\Burning Crusade Install Log OverrideInstallerRegistryKey World of Warcraft/OverrideInstaller OriginalInstallPathRegistryKey World of Warcraft/InstallPath Win32_SuggestedRAM 512 MacOS_SuggestedRAM 512 Intel_SuggestedMHz 800 PowerPC_SuggestedMHz 933 Win9x_SupportedOS 4,10 # 95:4,0 98:4,10 ME:4,90 # Burning Crusade will install on 98/ME even though it is not officially supported WinNT_SupportedOS 5,0 # NT4:4,0 2K:5,0 XP:5,1 MacOS_SupportedOS 1039 # XXYZ = XX.Y.Z CanCreateDesktopShortcut 1 MustInstallInExistingFolder 0 #MacOS_BaseInstallLocation # using the default value #Win32_BaseInstallLocation # using the default value MacOS_InstallerData Burning Crusade Disc 1:Burning Crusade Disc 1:Installer Tome.mpq Win32_InstallerData Burning Crusade Disc 1:BCDisc1:Installer Tome.mpq ProgressBarInMainWindow 1
